name: Glyph predictor
description: This app predicts the glyph sequence based on your first and later glyph input.  * Glyph predictor is not official Ingress app.  How to use: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eogZA8NfbGg 1. Launch the app and start overlay. 2. Tap refresh button. 3. Select glyph count. 4. Input first glyph on handwriting input overlay. 5. If the glyph sequence isnt determined, you should select or handwriting next glyph. 6. The glyph sequence is determined, the result is shown on button layer.  IMPERFECT is very special glyph to input. Please watch this video to recognize how to draw IMPERFECT. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HrroS7PLIiw
